extends Client

    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Specified by:
      login in class Client

    • purchaseCoupon

      public void purchaseCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Register a new coupon purchase by customer.
      Parameters:
      coupon - - to be purchased.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if coupon doesn't exist in DataBase.

      2) if coupon already purchased by this customer.

      3) if coupon doesn't purchasable cause its start date didn't arrive or its expire date had passed or its amount is 0.

      4)if updating coupon amount in DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getCustomerCoupons

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons() throws CouponSystemException
      Get all coupons of the customer.
      Returns:
      List - list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if there's no coupon purchased by the selected customer.

      2)if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getCustomerCouponsByCategory

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getCustomerCouponsByCategory​(Category category) throws CouponSystemException
      Get all coupons of the customer in specific category.
      Returns:
      List - list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if there's no coupon purchased by the selected customer in the selected category.

      2)if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getCustomerCouponByPrice

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getCustomerCouponByPrice​(double price) throws CouponSystemException
      Get all coupons of the customer.
      Returns:
      List - list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if there's no coupon purchased by the selected customer up to that price.

      2)if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getCustomerDetails

      public Customer getCustomerDetails() throws CouponSystemException
      Get customer details from DataBase.
      Returns:
      Customer
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if customer doesn't exist in DataBase.

      2)if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

      Throws:
      CouponSystemException
